modules.description: This module enables multi-shot continuation handling by converting and manipulating deep continuations. It provides operations to promote, resume, and abort deep continuations, along with cloning and dropping linear continuations. These functions are useful for advanced control flow management, such as implementing non-local exits, coroutines, or exception handling with custom backtrace support.

This module enables multi-shot continuation manipulation by converting and invoking shallow continuations. It provides operations to promote, resume, and abort shallow continuations with explicit value or exception injection. These functions work directly with shallow continuations and resumptions, supporting use cases like non-local control flow, exception handling with custom backtraces, and continuation cloning or disposal.

This module implements multi-shot continuation semantics using both deep and shallow continuation manipulation. It provides functions to promote, resume, clone, and abort continuations, enabling advanced control flow mechanisms such as coroutines, non-local exits, and custom exception handling with backtrace support. The deep submodule handles continuation transformations across function calls, while the shallow submodule operates directly on immediate continuations with explicit value or exception injection.
